Header.title: Samuel Hali'a Nelson
Header.paragraph: Welcome! Have a look around to learn more about me, and see some of the cool things I've made!

About.paragraph: The most important thing to know, is that I love developing solutions to problems. I am a first-generation college graduate, of mixed ancestry including AAPI and Native Hawaiian descent. I’m a tinkerer and self-starter who loves making things. I am pursuing a career in tech to follow a longstanding passion for creativity and technology, but primarily to have a meaningful impact on others with similar passions.

Experience.text: ✔ Developed and deployed full-stack web applications, with modern back-end and front-end technologies for state management and data storage & retrieval.⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✔ Leveraged Agile methodology framework and pair programming sessions, fostering teamwork and problem-solving skills throughout the full software development lifecycle (SDLC).⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✔ Designed and utilized RESTful APIs for data communication in full-stack applications.
Experience.name: Prime Digital Academy, Full-Stack Software Engineering Certification (2023) ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

Experience.text: ✔ Utilized excel and proprietary database, ran daily analytics reports, analyzed the data of thousands of client accounts, reviewed mortgage collateral documents, and coordinated with internal Wells Fargo teams.⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ ✔ Cultivated and strengthened working relationships with business clients of Wells Fargo, both small businesses and large corporate clients.
Experience.name: Wells Fargo, Account Associate (2018-2022) ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

Experience.text: Concentration on political theory, public policy, and quantitative analysis. Additional study of leadership methods, practice, and psychology.
Experience.name: University of Minnesota, Bachelor of Arts (2014) ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀
